alert.note: Alert for Le Sueur (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 27 at 8:18PM CDT until August 27 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DAKOTA...SOUTHEASTERN LE SUEUR...SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT AND RICE COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lonsdale, or 13 miles west of Northfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Webster around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Elko New Market, Lakeville and Farmington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
